title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 201.7 - Notice of pending petitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 201.7 - Notice of pending petitions

State Regulations

Upon the filing of a petition under this Part, notice
thereof, including the date when such petition was filed, the name and address
of the petitioner, the name and address of the public employer involved, and
the unit claimed to be appropriate shall be maintained by an agent of the board
on a public docket to be kept by the board at its principal
office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
201.7

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
